source_objects.title: Python
source_objects.description: Take one of Udemy’s range of Python courses and learn how to code using this incredibly useful language. Its simple syntax and readability makes Python perfect for Flask, Django, data science, and machine learning. You’ll learn how to build everything from games to sites to apps. Choose from a range of courses that will appeal to both beginners and advanced developers alike.

items.title: Learn Python: The Complete Python Programming Course

visible_instructors.title: Avinash Jain
visible_instructors.name: Avinash
visible_instructors.job_title: CEO of TheCodex.me - Teaching 500,000+ Students how to code

items.headline: Learn A-Z everything about Python, from the basics, to advanced topics like Python GUI, Python Data Analysis, and more!
objectives_summary: Create their own Python Programs
Become an experienced Python Programmer
Parse the Web and Create their own Games

objectives_summary: Have an intermediate skill level of Python programming.
Use the Jupyter Notebook Environment.
Use the numpy library to create and manipulate arrays.

items.title: Python for Beginners - Learn Programming from scratch
items.headline: Python For Beginners : This course is meant for absolute beginners in programming or in python.

To learn the CORE skills to understand any programming language

items.title: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python Programming
